member.name: T:Microsoft.Hawaii.Smash.Client.NamespaceDoc
member.summary: The Microsoft.Hawaii.Smash.Client namespace provides classes that implement the client library that connects to the Hawaii Smash Service to enable social computing scenarios.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Hawaii.Smash.Client.ChangeSetLimitException
member.summary: This exception is thrown if too many changes have been added to a single table change context. The total limit is 100 'change units', whereas each record add accounts for 1 change units, and each record delete / update accounts for 3 change units. For example, 70 adds, 8 updates and 2 deletes amount to a total of 100 change units.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Hawaii.Smash.Client.Common.DataRow_Wire
member.summary: This class represents per-record data used to synchronize SmashTable records between sessions and the Smash service. Applications do not use this class directly.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Hawaii.Smash.Client.Common.DataRow_Wire.Action
member.summary: Gets or sets the type of operation this data record represents

member.name: P:Microsoft.Hawaii.Smash.Client.Common.DataRow_Wire.GUID
member.summary: Gets or set the unique record identifier for this row

member.name: P:Microsoft.Hawaii.Smash.Client.Common.DataRow_Wire.TimeStamp
member.summary: Gets or sets the timestamp (UTC ticks) for last modification of this record

member.name: P:Microsoft.Hawaii.Smash.Client.Common.DataRow_Wire.CreatorClient
member.summary: Gets or sets the client id for the creator of this row

member.name: P:Microsoft.Hawaii.Smash.Client.Common.DataRow_Wire.ModificationFlag
member.summary: Gets or sets a flag used to keep track of modification state

member.name: P:Microsoft.Hawaii.Smash.Client.Common.DataRow_Wire.TypeHash
member.summary: Gets or sets the type hash for the SmashTable this row belongs to

member.name: P:Microsoft.Hawaii.Smash.Client.Common.DataRow_Wire.Blob
member.summary: Gets or sets the JSON serialized SmashRecord payload for this row

member.name: T:Microsoft.Hawaii.Smash.Client.Common.SessionInfo
member.summary: Details about a Smash Session.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Hawaii.Smash.Client.Common.SessionInfo.MeetingToken
member.summary: Gets or sets the meeting token.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Hawaii.Smash.Client.Common.SessionInfo.SessionID
member.summary: Gets or sets the session ID.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Hawaii.Smash.Client.Common.SessionInfo.ManagementID
member.summary: Gets or sets the management secret. Non-owners of the session will only see Guid.Empty values for this field.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Hawaii.Smash.Client.Common.SessionInfo.SessionName
member.summary: Gets or sets name of the session.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Hawaii.Smash.Client.Common.SessionInfo.OwnerName
member.summary: Gets or sets user name of the session owner.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Hawaii.Smash.Client.Common.SessionInfo.OwnerEmail
member.summary: Gets or sets email address of the session owner.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Hawaii.Smash.Client.Common.SessionInfo.CreatedTime
member.summary: Gets or sets time (UTC) this session was created.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Hawaii.Smash.Client.Common.SessionInfo.Lifetime
member.summary: Gets or sets the duration of the session lifetime.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Hawaii.Smash.Client.Common.SessionInfo.Attendees
member.summary: Gets or sets the list of user names allowed to join the session.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Hawaii.Smash.Client.Common.SessionInfo.TotalTableDataStored
member.summary: Gets or sets the approximate total number of bytes of table storage used by the session.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Hawaii.Smash.Client.Common.SessionInfo.TotalStorageTransactions
member.summary: Gets or sets the approximate total number of storage transactions used by the session.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Hawaii.Smash.Client.Common.SessionInfo.TotalDataEgress
member.summary: Gets or sets the approximate total number of bytes of Azure data center egress used by the session.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Hawaii.Smash.Client.Common.SessionInfo.TotalBlobDataStored
member.summary: Gets or sets the approximate total number of bytes of blob storage used by the session.

member.summary: Re-activates a session when application comes back from tombstone state.
member.param: Azure Data Market client id used for authentication.
Azure Data Market client secret used for authentication.
The Dispatcher object. a dispatcher must be specified in order to use data binding with Smash.
The tombstoned state.
The set of SmashTable objects to join to the re-activated session.
member.returns: the Smash session object.

member.summary: Forces a refresh of data in SmashTable associated with session. If session uses long poll, this has no effect.

member.summary: Resumes session synchronization after rejoining from tombstone states.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Hawaii.Smash.Client.SmashSession.RefreshInterval
member.summary: Gets or sets the refresh interval (in ms) for data in all SmashTable joined to the session. A value of 0 indicates that the Session will use 'long poll' for almost instantaneous refresh of session data. A non-0 value specifies the number of ms between refresh operations.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Hawaii.Smash.Client.SessionManager.JoinSessionAsync(System.String,System.String,System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher,System.Guid,System.String,System.String,System.String,Microsoft.Hawaii.Smash.Client.ISmashTable[],System.Object)
member.summary: Joins a Smash session. User+email+device must be unique across all joinees of a session.
member.param: Azure Data Market client id used for authentication.
Azure Data Market client secret used for authentication.
The Dispatcher object. a dispatcher must be specified in order to use data binding with Smash.
The meeting token of the session to join.
User name joining the session.
email address of the user joining the session.
Device name of the user joining the session.
Array of ISmashTable for all SmashTable objects to be associated with the joined session.
State to be passed as userState in the completion event args.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Hawaii.Smash.Client.SessionManager.JoinSessionAsync(System.String,System.String,System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher,System.Guid,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Boolean,Microsoft.Hawaii.Smash.Client.ISmashTable[],System.Object)
member.summary: Joins a Smash session. User+email+device must be unique across all joinees of a session.
member.param: Azure Data Market client id used for authentication.
Azure Data Market client secret used for authentication.
The Dispatcher object. a dispatcher must be specified in order to use data binding with Smash.
The meeting token of the session to join.
User name joining the session.
email address of the user joining the session.
Device name of the user joining the session.
A value of 'true' overrides user+email+device uniqueness requirement for joining a session.
Array of ISmashTable for all SmashTable objects to be associated with the joined session.
State to be passed as userState in the completion event args.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Hawaii.Smash.Client.SessionManager.CreateSessionAsync(System.String,System.String,System.Guid,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.String},System.TimeSpan,System.Guid,System.Object)
member.summary: Creates a new smash session.
member.param: Azure Data Market client id used for authentication.
Azure Data Market client secret used for authentication.
The meeting token of the session to create. Needs to be shared to allow others to join the session.
The name of the session.
The organizer of the session.
email address of organizer of session.
List of user names allowed to join a session. A wildcard '*' matches all users attempting to join.
The lifetime of the session. Can be up to 30 days. The session will automatically be erased after expiration of this timespan.
The owner's management secret required to enumerate, modify, wipe sessions.
State to be passed as userState in the completion event args.

member.summary: Gets or sets the session ID of the session.

member.summary: Gets or sets a chunk of data to be added to the blob.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Hawaii.Smash.Client.SmashClientREST.stagingServiceScopeConfigFileName
member.summary: The name of the config file that indicates what is the translater service scope. Used only as a test hook.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Hawaii.Smash.Client.SmashClientREST.serviceScope
member.summary: The service scope. This is the private variable that is initialized on first access via the GetServiceScope() method. If a config file is present to point to a staging server, that host will be stored. Otherwise, the default is used.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Hawaii.Smash.Client.SmashClientREST.GetServiceScope
member.summary: Returns the service scope to be used when accessing the adm OAuth service. This will generally be the value generated by the DefaultServiceScope, but it can conditionally be set with the presence of a config file on first access.
member.returns: A string containing the service scope.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Hawaii.Smash.Client.SmashClientREST.ServiceScope
member.summary: Gets the service scope to be used when accessing the adm OAuth service.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Hawaii.Smash.Client.Contracts.NamespaceDoc
member.summary: The Microsoft.Hawaii.Smash.Client.Contracts namespace includes service contract definitions. Users of the Windows and Windows Phone clients do not directly use these classes; they are useful for those who are developing clients for other platforms.

member.summary: Generic class for a SmashTable.
member.typeparam: Type of records. T must derive from SmashRecordBase.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Hawaii.Smash.Client.ISmashTable
member.summary: Base interface for SmashTable<T>. Application classes do not implement this interface.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Hawaii.Smash.Client.ISmashTable.SetSession(Microsoft.Hawaii.Smash.Client.SmashSession)
member.summary: Attaches a SmashSession to a SmashTable. This is used internally by Smash and applications should not call this API.
member.param: the SmashSession to attach the SmashTable to.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Hawaii.Smash.Client.ISmashTable.GetState(System.Collections.Generic.List{Microsoft.Hawaii.Smash.Client.Common.DataRow_Wire})
member.summary: Gets serialable state from the derived SmashTable for application hibernation. This is used internally by Smash and applications should not call this API.
member.param: A List to which serialized record data is appended.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Hawaii.Smash.Client.ISmashTable.PrepareSendRecord(System.Guid,System.Guid,System.Int64,Microsoft.Hawaii.Smash.Client.Common.SendRowAction,System.Int32,System.Byte[])
member.summary: Internal method used by Smash to synchronize table state with state shared by the Smash service. This is used internally by Smash and applications should not call this API.
member.param: Record ID
ID of the creator client
Time stamp
action for rows
modification flag
blob to prepare
member.returns: Action to take

member.name: P:Microsoft.Hawaii.Smash.Client.ISmashTable.TypeHash
member.summary: Unique identifying hash of the derived SmashTable's type and name. This is used internally by Smash and applications should not call this API.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the SmashTable class. (T,name) must be unique for all SmashTable joined to a single session.
member.param: The name of the table.

member.summary: Smash uses this internally to associate a SmashTable with a session. Applications do not use this directly.

member.summary: Smash uses this internally to capture tombstone state for a session. Applications do not use this directly.

member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the session.

member.summary: Gets or sets the organizer of the session.

member.summary: Gets or sets email address of organizer of the session.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Hawaii.Smash.Client.Contracts.CreateSessionRequest.Attendees
member.summary: Gets or sets list of user names allowed to join a session. A wildcard '*' matches all users attempting to join.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Hawaii.Smash.Client.Contracts.CreateSessionRequest.Lifetime
member.summary: Gets or sets the lifetime of the session. Can be up to 30 days. The session will automatically be erased after expiration of this timespan.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Hawaii.Smash.Client.Contracts.CreateSessionRequest.ManagementID
member.summary: Gets or sets the owner's management secret required to enumerate, modify, wipe sessions.
